introduce.title: Knowledge of number
introduce.text: The number 12 is a composite number, the smallest number with exactly six divisors, its divisors being 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 and 12. Twelve is also a highly composite number, the next one being twenty-four. Twelve is a sublime number, a number that has a perfect number of divisors, and the sum of its divisors is also a perfect number. Since there is a subset of 12's proper divisors that add up to 12 (all of them but with 4 excluded), 12 is a semiperfect number. The number 12 is also a superfactorial, being the product of 3, 2, 1, and 1. Lastly, 12 is a Harshad number since it is divisible by the sum of its base 10 digits.

singleNum.title: Single number
singleNum.text: 数字12是一款集合了多种数字游戏的游戏，包括数独、猜数字、滑动吧数字、数字华容道、2048等。

numGames.title: Number games
numGames.text: 数字12是一款集合了多种数字游戏的游戏，包括数独、猜数字、滑动吧数字、数字华容道、2048等。

sudoku.name: Sudoku
sudoku.helpGoalText: Fill in a 9×9 grid with digits so that each column, row, and 3×3 section contain the numbers between 1 to 9.
sudoku.helpPlayText: In a new game start, the 9×9 grid will have some of the squares filled in. You can use logic to fill in the missing digits and complete the grid.
sudoku.helpLi1: Any row contains more than one of the same number.
sudoku.helpLi2: Any column contains more than one of the same number.
sudoku.helpLi3: Any 3×3 grid contains more than one of the same number.

guess.name: Number Guess
guess.helpText1: You need to guess 4 different numbers.
guess.helpText3: For example 5678. If you guess 0128, you can get 1A0B. If you guess 5627, you can get 2A1B
guess.helpText4: Every game has 8 times to guess.
guess.helpText5: Less times guessed right, more stars got.

slide.name: Slide
slide.helpText1: You can use a finger swipe to look for more than three pieces of digital color that are connected together and erase it.

about.title: About
about.author: Author: Bob Liu (Bob Game)
about.desc1: This is my own practice coding work, all free, no paid content, I hope players like to play.

lang.title: Language
lang.desc: Please choose your language and apply it.
